column4: I want to Know if anyone can help me?   I have a laptop hardrive but no laptop, and i want to transfer that data onto a friends regular pc harddrive...is this possible?
I want to Know if anyone can help me?   I have a laptop hardrive but no laptop, and i want to transfer that data onto a friends regular pc harddrive...is this possible?
is there a better channel to ask this question?
yeah you can get a mini IDE to IDE converter... and just plug it in :)
